titleText: This week in Alexa Skills development
mainText: This week, we have some interesting releases from Alexa developer blogs. A new blog released in the to explain the experience of an Alexa Skills developer about a Google SPRINT kind of Idea to create design and validate a Alexa skill in 5 days. This is an interesting read. This us must read for Alexa Skills developers.

titleText: This week in Space Explorer skill
mainText: This week - developer Jon Mongan published a detailed blog post for explaining how to build the interaction model for his recent release of space explorer sample skill.
